projectGridLines.title: Development of Corrosion prevention/mitigation plan for plant structures.
projectGridLines.description:
Development of Corrosion prevention/mitigation plan for plant structures.

Develop and implement a comprehensive corrosion prevention and mitigation plan for plant structures, ensuring their longevity, safety, and reliability while minimizing maintenance costs and downtime.

Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)

路        Non-Destructive Testing (NDT)

路        Surface Preparation Techniques

Other soft skill competencies required

Learning agility, Creativity, adaptability

Expected learning (in bullet points)

路        Enhanced Understanding of Corrosion Mechanisms

路        Effective Application of Protective Measures
